name: Repair Raider
description:
The year is 20XX, all that is left are the barren wastelands, relics of the old world, and ravenous robots ready to rip apart anything they can. You must make it to the drop point with your goods and your trusty cybertruck, defending it and your cargo from thieves along the way.

This project was built as part of Global Game Jam 2020.

Controls

Generic USB controller (Instructions in game)

or

Arrow keys to move, space to attack, F to enter and exit the vehicle.
